title: Intensive Short-Term Workshop for Enhancing Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital information access skills and practical experience in elementary education settings
context.additional_context: Designed for in-service elementary teachers to enhance information evaluation/utilization competencies for classroom application. Conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a three-step criterion to evaluate the credibility of diverse information sources.
Learners can apply two or more information search strategies suitable for elementary education settings.
Learners can develop a checklist to identify misinformation and refine it through peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
